channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Epstein wrote Trump "knew about the girls," newly released emails show
item.description: Democrats on the House Oversight Committee released emails Wednesday, including one from 2019 in which disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein alleged tha...

item.title: What we know about Trump's relationship with Epstein
item.description: Chart: Axios Visuals President Trump 's alleged submission to a birthday book compiled for Jeffrey Epstein was released on Monday after the president ...

item.title: Bessent says "substantial" relief imminent on coffee, fruit prices
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Wednesday touted "substantial" actions in the coming days that he said would lower the prices of coffee and some f...

item.title: House Democrats plot to bypass Mike Johnson in effort to salvage shutdown deal
item.description: House Democrats have landed on their plan of attack to try to salvage what they see as an inadequate deal to end the government shutdown: A discharge ...

item.title: Google targets China-based scam operators sending Americans' toll fraud texts
item.description: Google filed a lawsuit today against alleged China -based operators behind "Lighthouse," a phishing platform it says fuels the toll-payment text scam ...

item.title: Former aide to N.Y. governors operated as agent for China, prosecutors say
item.description: Federal officials accuse Linda Sun of secretly helping the Chinese government while working in senior positions for New York state government.

item.title: House Democrats release Epstein emails that mention Trump
item.description: Republicans on the House Oversight Committee released thousands of files from Epstein’s estate in response.

item.title: U.S. allies begin to push back on Trump’s Caribbean military strikes
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio, appearing at a G-7 gathering in Canada, faces renewed questions about America’s foreign policy aims.

item.title: House effort to force vote on releasing Epstein files can advance
item.description: A discharge petition now has the 218 signatures needed to trigger a vote on releasing more Epstein files.

item.title: Rep. Adelita Grijalva sworn in, setting up vote on release of Epstein files
item.description: The ceremony ended a seven-week standoff with House Speaker Mike Johnson that left Grijalva unable to fully represent Arizona’s 7th Congressional Dist...

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
